title: MuPAD
summary: MuPAD is a computer algebra system (CAS). Originally developed by the MuPAD research group at the University of Paderborn, Germany, development was taken over by the company SciFace Software GmbH & Co. KG in cooperation with the MuPAD research group and partners from some other universities starting in 1997.  MuPAD's graphics package was particularly successful, especially considering the era when it was developed.
